languages.text: "Пес, конечно, славный спутник, да только куда собаке до волка? Вот где ярость, вот где сила и удаль!"
"A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"
languages.original_text: "Пес, конечно, славный спутник, да только куда собаке до волка? Вот где ярость, вот где сила и удаль!"

traits.locale_text: "A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"
"A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"
"A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"
"A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"
"A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"

languages.text: 「もちろん、猟犬は優れた伴侶だ。だが犬など、狼の前では何だというんだ？あれこそが真の憤怒、真の力、そして真の武勇だ！」
languages.original_text: "A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、猟犬は優れた伴侶だ。だが犬など、狼の前では何だというんだ？あれこそが真の憤怒、真の力、そして真の武勇だ！」

languages.text: "Ein Hund ist natürlich ein guter Gefährte, doch was ist schon ein Hund im Vergleich zu einem Wolf? Ein Wolf, das ist wahrer Zorn, wahre Stärke und Kraft!"
languages.original_text: "A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Hund ist natürlich ein guter Gefährte, doch was ist schon ein Hund im Vergleich zu einem Wolf? Ein Wolf, das ist wahrer Zorn, wahre Stärke und Kraft!"

languages.text: « Un chien est bien évidemment un excellent compagnon, mais il fait pâle figure à côté d'un loup, l'incarnation de la fureur, de la force et de la bravoure ! »
languages.original_text: "A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"

traits.locale_text: « Un chien est bien évidemment un excellent compagnon, mais il fait pâle figure à côté d'un loup, l'incarnation de la fureur, de la force et de la bravoure ! »

languages.text: «Un sabueso es un compañero excelente, claro, ¿pero qué es un perro en comparación con un lobo? ¡Eso sí que es genuina furia, fuerza y destreza!».
languages.original_text: "A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"

traits.locale_text: «Un sabueso es un compañero excelente, claro, ¿pero qué es un perro en comparación con un lobo? ¡Eso sí que es genuina furia, fuerza y destreza!».

languages.text: “猎狗确实是不错的伙伴，但与狼相比，狗又算得上什么呢？看看狼吧，那才叫真正的怒火、真正的力量、真正的杀戮！”
languages.original_text: "A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"

traits.locale_text: “猎狗确实是不错的伙伴，但与狼相比，狗又算得上什么呢？看看狼吧，那才叫真正的怒火、真正的力量、真正的杀戮！”

languages.text: "Tazılar iyi yoldaş olur ama köpek, kurtla kıyaslanabilir mi hiç? Asıl hiddet, kuvvet ve cesaret kurtlardadır!"
languages.original_text: "A hound, of course, is a fine companion, but what is a dog next to a wolf? Now that is true fury, true strength and prowess!"

traits.locale_text: "Tazılar iyi yoldaşlardır ama köpek, kurtla kıyaslanabilir mi hiç? Asıl hiddet, kuvvet ve cesaret kurtlardadır!"
